topics.body:
WOAH

Already a couple of minutes into the finale already, and [spoiler]a bunch of wall-cultists just got owned by Annie getting decked into their temple by Eren, and the whole thing's kaupt...and a bunch of them are probably dead from being smashed or crushed.[/spoiler]

[spoiler]I never really liked them, but DAMN that was pretty much overkill.[/spoiler]

This is only going to get more hectic, since it's the season finale anyway, and we need a big finish for all its worth. Wonder what's going to happen next.
